law.text:
Unless the Governor orders otherwise, if the Governor revokes a conditional pardon for a breach of any of its conditions, the individual released on the conditional pardon:
shall serve the unserved portion of the sentence originally imposed; and
may not be granted credit for serving any portion of the original sentence during the time that the individual was released under the conditional pardon.
